ModMetaData.name: Large Faction Bases
ModMetaData.author: newcolonist
ModMetaData.description:
Generate larger faction bases. Their size and manpower evolve with time. It also factors in the difficulty level, and some randomness.
Safe to add/remove in-game.
For compatibility issues with other mods changing faction bases, check 'Choose your faction base' from BronkenBed.
